title: Lego Rovers Evolution
abstractText:
The aims of this Lego Rovers Evolution project are to: raise awareness of current research on autonomous systems in the UK (specifically that taking place at the University of Liverpool, in collaboration with worldwide experts); inform secondary school children about the challenges involved in creating autonomous systems; and to enthuse them about robotics, computer science, programming and engineering.

We intend to achieve these by developing a hands-on activity aimed at children in Key Stages 2-4 which will provide an ongoing resource for use by the organisations involved in the project, and will be available on the Internet in a form suitable for schools, parents and anyone else with an appropriate Lego Mindstorms Robot to download and use.
